meanings.sent1: The cake batter was overmixed, resulting in a dense and heavy texture.
meanings.sent2: The overmixed paint had a strange, muddled color that was not pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent3: She overmixed the colors on her palette, creating a muddy mess that made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The overmixed ingredients in the salad blended together like a chaotic whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The overmixed dough was like trying to sculpt with sticky clay.

meanings.definition: To blend ingredients together too thoroughly.
meanings.sent1: He overmixed the pancake batter, resulting in tough and chewy pancakes.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to overmix the cookie dough, or the cookies will turn out flat.
meanings.sent3: She overmixed the soup until it resembled a strange, unidentifiable concoction.
meanings.sent4: The chef overmixed the sauce, creating a flavor that clashed with the dish.
meanings.sent5: The blender overmixed the smoothie, leaving chunks of fruit unblended.
